name: Rising (itch) (LegionGames)
description:
Collect stopwatches to get more time. Avoid pins and flamethrowers. You can't actually get to space. But give it your best shot.

Music: https://www.bensound.com/royalty-free-music/track/dreams-chill-out

Game made for Godot Jam 16. Theme: Short on time
